sentences.en: And if the reigning Western Conference champs are saying that, who else is?
sentences.cn: 在西部季后赛中, 谁是最后的主宰?

sentences.en: And in Kings and Chronicles, He's our Reigning King.
sentences.cn: 在《列王记上》和《列王记下》, 他是统治我们的君王.

sentences.en: But the worst damage is likely to be to reigning world champion's image.
sentences.cn: 但最大的伤害很可能是对卫冕世界冠军的形象.

sentences.en: He also challenged the reigning assumption that oligopolies were inherently inefficient.
sentences.cn: 钱德勒同样也质疑寡头卖主垄断在本质上效率低下这一占主导地位的假定.

sentences.en: He was beat to a pulp by the reigning champ.
sentences.cn: 他被现任冠军打得死去活来.

sentences.en: Led by Huang Chao , they brought down the reigning house after 300 years'rule.
sentences.cn: 在黄巢的带领下他们推翻了统治了三百年的王朝.

sentences.en: Led by Huang Chao, they brought down the reigning house after 300 years' rule.
sentences.cn: 在黄巢的带领下，他们推翻了统治了三百年的王朝。

sentences.en: On Monday, home side Chicago bears stunned the reigning Super Bowl champion Dallas Cowboys.
sentences.cn: 星期一, 芝加哥黑熊队丰场挫败了超级碗赛卫冕冠军达拉斯牛仔队.

sentences.en: Oureight - man boat is trying to defend its reigning Olympic champion status.
sentences.cn: 我们的八人赛艇队将尽力捍卫自己的奥运冠军地位.

sentences.en: Reigning champion? Camilla watches Charles play table football.
sentences.cn: 能得冠军 吗 ?查尔斯玩桌上足球,卡米拉在旁观战.

sentences.en: Rocky Balboa has knocked the reigning heavyweight champion down!
sentences.cn: 洛奇巴尔博将不败拳王迪克逊击倒!

sentences.en: The current reigning emperor is fatuous and self - indulgent , he just hunts in the hunting enclosure everyday.
sentences.cn: 现在的皇帝是个昏君, 每天只知道在围场打猎.

sentences.en: The NBA's reigning MVP, James has been under weather for the past few days.
sentences.cn: 詹姆斯,NBA去年的MVP, 在过去的数日里一直身体欠佳.

sentences.en: The reigning world champion also slower than his teammate Heikki Kovalainen throughout Friday.
sentences.cn: 卫冕世界冠军也慢于他的队友科瓦莱宁在整个周五.

sentences.en: The sky was dark, stars were twinkling high above , night was reigning , and everything was sunk in silken silence.
sentences.cn: 天很黑, 星很繁,夜阑人静.

words.tran_cn: 统治的；在位的；本届的；起支配作用的

trans.tran_cn: 在位的，统治的，起支配作用的，本届的
